title: Zombie
description: Role is to infect players and persude others they are not zombies. Zombies will have a limited amount of emojis they can use and can recognize other zombies

title: Infected
description: If infected, will turn into zombie after two rounds if not healed by doctor. Infected player has limited emojis at their disposal. Stil counts as human until coversion

title: Doctor
description: Can heal one player once per night, preventing that person from being infected or curing that person if they were infected.

title: Civilians
description: Regular ol'civilian, no special abilities or role. good luck!

title: Officer
description: Can inspect a player once per night to see if they are infected. Immune to infection, if biten by zombie, Officer is notified of a random zombie.
